title: Creators of World's Edge Launch GoFundMe Campaign to Fund Festival
text:
The creators of World's Edge, a martial arts and cosplay festival , have now launched a GoFundMe campaign to raise funds for the production of this event. Participants will have a chance to meet others who share their interests and hone their skills in martial arts and other fields.
The festival will be held for two weeks on a private island in the Philippines where fictional universes will converge for a number of events. Attendees will have the chance to train with celebrity guests, including some of the best martial arts masters in the world. The event will include panel discussions, pool and dance parties, cosplay contests and photo shoots. Those attending can train with swords, knives, Muay Thai, boxing and other martial arts as well as participate in seminars on martial arts history and philosophy. There will be LARP wars, training in group tactics and team operations, yoga, hiking and nature walks and water taxies between the island and Subic Bay, where visitors can tour the area, attend nightclubs or eat at restaurants. Guests are free to participate in as many activities as they choose and to learn as much as possible during the two weeks about cosplay, martial arts and other skills.
As seen at https://www.gofundme.com/worldsedge , the GoFundMe campaign offers pledge levels from $5 to $10,101, and perks from personal training to the opportunity to be a staff member at the event. For more information on the specific prizes associated with each pledge level, see the GoFundMe page.
The creator of World's Edge has also launched another project at https://www.gofundme.com/dangerzonerpg/ to fund The Dangerzone RPG, a turn-based tactical role-playing game that includes information that encourages players to learn and apply strategic thinking.
About World's Edge:
World's Edge is the most comprehensive martial arts and cosplay event ever, held on a private island in the Philippines and features the greatest master martial artists, cosplayers, live-action role players, anime lovers and comic enthusiasts in one event.
